permission.description: Allow camera access to verify your details

error.notAllowed: Camera access not granted or blocked by a browser/extensions.  Enable access in your browser/extension to continue. You may need to refresh.
error.abort: Something happened, and we lost access to your camera. Please refresh.
error.notReadable: There seems to be a problem with your camera connection. Please check and try again or try using device.
error.notFound: We are unable to find your camera. Please refresh.
error.insecure: Secure connection required. Camera access is disabled on insecure sites. Please switch to the secure page or contact the app owner.

instructions.title: Next, we'll take a quick selfie

goodLight.body: Make sure you are in a well-lit environment.

clearImage.body: Hold your device steady so the selfie is clear and sharp.

removeObstructions.body: Remove anything that covers your face, such as glasses, masks, and hats.

wideSmile.body: When asked to smile, give a wide smile, showing your teeth.

tip.fitHead: Fit your head inside the oval frame

error.minFrames: SmartCameraWeb: The minimum no of frames required is {{count}}
error.webcamCapture: Unable to capture webcam images - Please try another device

alert.multipleFaces: Ensure only one face is visible
alert.noFace: Position your face in the oval
alert.outOfBounds: Position your face in the oval

capture.instructionText: Make sure all corners are visible and there is no glare.

instructions.description: We'll use it to verify your identity.

goodLight.body: Make sure the image is taken in a well-lit environment where the ID document is easy to read.

clearImage.body: Hold your device steady so the information on the ID are not blurry.

review.question: Is the document clear and readable?
review.description: Make sure all corners of the document are visible and there is no glare

error.readingFile: An error occurred reading the file. Please check the file, and try again
error.multipleFiles: Only one file upload is permitted at a time
error.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported file format. Please ensure that you are providing a JPG or PNG image
error.fileTooLarge: {{filename}} is too large. Please ensure that the file is less than {{size}}.

consent.demoTip: This consent screen is for illustrative purposes only. Demo App does not collect personal ID data.

personalDetails.title: Process your personal information
personalDetails.description: Partner can process your names, DoB and gender

contactInfo.title: Process your contact information
contactInfo.description: Partner can process your phone numbers and address

documentInfo.title: Process your document information
documentInfo.description: Partner can process your photo, ID expiration date, country of issuance and document number

consent.grantConsent: By choosing "Allow", you grant {{partnerName}} consent to process your personal data to offer you this service

denied.title: Consent Denied
denied.message: We cannot verify you without your consent

loading.title: Setting up
loading.subtitle: Just a few more seconds
loading.description: We are setting up your verification flow

complete.title: Submission Complete
complete.subtitle: That's all you need to verify your identity
complete.processingInfo: We will process your {{country}} - {{idType}} information to verify your identity

entry.title: Provide Signature
entry.subtitle: Read and accept the agreements you would see in the next page

name.title: Add your full names
name.description: Type your full names once you agree with the document(s) shared with you

signature.title: Append your signature
signature.description: Sign or upload your signature to certify the documents

review.title: Review documents
review.subtitle: Before accepting, carefully read through the document(s)
review.consent: By ticking this checkbox, you agree to the conditions in the document(s)

personalInfo.title: Add your full names
personalInfo.subtitle: Kindly add your full names to verify that you read the document(s) provided earlier.

signature.title: Add your signature
signature.subtitle: Sign or upload your signature below

confirmDetails.title: Confirm details
confirmDetails.subtitle: Make sure your name is correctly spelled, and the signature matches the one on your ID

error.uploadFailed: We could not upload your signature

error.title: An error occurred
error.uploadFailed: We could not upload your information
error.checkInternet: Please check that you have a stable internet connection. Then try again!
